Description: Ibanez EKM10T Eric Krasno Sig Semi-Hollow Guitar Wine Red OB 190839403896 J19594005001004 Gear returned in great condition, with only minor signs of use, such as slight scuffs or pick marks. It looks and plays like new and may be considered an equivalent to display units found in retail stores. Full Manufacturer warranty not applicable on all used products. The Ibanez EKM Series EKM10T Eric Krasno Signature Semi-Hollow Electric Guitar guitar gives you the feel, features, and sound found in jazz/ funk legend Eric Krasno's prized instrument, but at a fraction of the price. It features an arched maple top, bound ebony fretboard, Super 58 pickups and an ART2 roller bridge with VBS80 vintage vibrato. Hardshell case included.
